documentation.description: Get anomaly detection jobs configuration info

job_id.description: Comma-separated list of identifiers for the anomaly detection job. It can be a job identifier, a group name, or a wildcard expression. If you do not specify one of these options, the API returns information for all anomaly detection jobs.

allow_no_match.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no jobs. (This includes `_all` string or when no jobs have been specified)

exclude_generated.description: Omits fields that are illegal to set on job PUT
